sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Procter & Gamble topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.4%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble registers a 8.1% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Merck, trading down 0.8%.
Merck is showing a gain of 10.7% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Verizon Communications, trading down 0.8%, and Apple, trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
